content: I faced an uncertain issue I intended to make transaction in Ethiopia but the card did not work. I checked with the customer support (the CS is good and timely responsive), who informed me that international transactions have been hault untill next notice. This has been a tough time for me due to difficulties in transactions in such foreign place.
replyContent: Hey Aditya! As per the RBI guidelines, international transactions are restricted with the Global Debit Card until further notice. However, you can order the Global credit card from the app and start using it for all your international transactions seamlessly. We apologize once again for any inconvenience it may have caused. - PG.
